seo_en: FLIR,SSH weak password vulnerability,brute force,high risk
summary: 该插件旨在检测FLIR设备是否存在SSH弱口令漏洞，通过爆破用户名和密码列表来发现潜在的安全风险。
summary_en: This plugin aims to detect whether FLIR devices have SSH weak password vulnerabilities by brute-forcing username and password lists to discover potential security risks.
